name: Ameca
description_of_product: A life-sized humanoid robot development platform with realistic facial expressions and advanced AI interaction capabilities.
description_of_company: Engineered Arts is a UK-based designer and manufacturer of human-like entertainment robots.
estimated_units_sold: Limited (development platform; only a handful of units worldwide)

name: Apollo
description_of_product: A full-size humanoid designed for logistics and manufacturing work.
description_of_company: Apptronik is an American robotics company focused on building versatile humanoid and exoskeleton robots.
estimated_price_per_unit: Expected to be commercially available by 2024

name: Reachy
description_of_product: Reachy is an open-source humanoid robot with an expressive head and articulated arms, designed for human-robot interaction and research. It can be controlled via Python or VR, making it ideal for education, experimentation, and telepresence.
description_of_company: Pollen Robotics is a French startup focused on ethical, open-source robotics. The company promotes transparency and accessibility in robot development, encouraging a global community of developers and researchers to experiment and build with its humanoid platform.
estimated_units_sold: Small-scale (tens to low hundreds for labs and developers)
key_investors: Private; community and EU innovation support
